arts.ttl: Fortuna Sittard strike late to down RKC
arts.sum: Fortuna Sittard struck a 94th minute winner as they defeated RKC Waalwijk 2-1. RKC were in decent form going into the game they seemed the most likely to score the opener, but some poor defending led to Alessio da Cruz making it 1-0 for Fortuna Sittard. The hosts then went in search for the equaliser [â€¦] The post Fortuna Sittard strike late to down RKC appeared first on Football Oranje.

Fortuna Sittard's hopes of securing a spot in the UEFA Conference League playoffs are at stake once again this Friday as they face RKC Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion. Waalwijk is looking to reignite ...
